hero.subtitle: I am Makia Yengue Godwill, A Dedicated
hero.lead: I deliver world-class digital solutions, blending cutting-edge technology with creative excellence. My work ensures seamless, high-quality experiences that captivate users and drive business growth.

freelance.title: Freelance Developer
freelance.description: Developed web and mobile applications, including a movie booking system, with a focus on software engineering and database management.

intern.title: Intern, NewTelnet Cameroon
intern.description: Assisted in designing telecommunication systems and optimizing network configurations for enhanced connectivity.

contributor.title: Project Contributor, University of Buea
contributor.description: Collaborated on network design projects, applying skills in software and networking engineering for campus solutions.

junior.title: Junior Developer, Local Startup
junior.description: Built web applications and managed databases, enhancing user experience and system efficiency.

university.title: University of Buea
university.description: General Computer Engineering, with coursework in software, networking, and telecommunication.

gce_advanced.title: GCE Advanced Level (Secondary Education)
gce_advanced.description: Graduated with honor from secondary education after scoring impressive grades in all 5 sciences subjects with an overall outstanding point of 22 / 25, preparing for engineering studies.

gce_ordinary.title: GCE Ordinary Level (Secondary Education)
gce_ordinary.description: Succeeded excellently in all 11 subjects, with impressive grades in pure sciences, social sciences and art, and giving me an outstanding point of 29 / 33.

skills.title: My Skills
skills.description: I turn bold ideas into powerful tech solutions. With sharp skills and a passion for results, I deliver innovations that works fast, smart, and hassle-free.

services.description: Premium development services for visionary businesses, organization or individuals. We transform ideas into high-performance digital experiences that drive results.

website.description: Transform your digital presence with our premium web development services. We craft blazing-fast, SEO-optimized websites that convert visitors into customers.

mobile.title: Mobile Development
mobile.description: Native-quality mobile apps that delight users and drive engagement. Built with React Native for cross-platform excellence.

design.title: Graphic & UI/UX Design
design.description: Comprehensive design solutions that bridge visual identity and digital experience. From brand aesthetics to intuitive interfaces, we create designs that captivate and convert.

projects.title: My Recent Works

blogs.title: Recent Blogs

footer.brand_description: Crafting digital experiences that inspire and delight. Let's create something extraordinary together.

introduction.title: Introduction
content: Welcome to MYG Tech, operated by Makia Yengue Godwill, a professional Computer Engineer specializing in web development, mobile development, UI/UX design, network administration, and video editing. This Privacy Policy governs the collection, use, storage, and protection of personal and non-personal information when you interact with our portfolio website.
This policy is designed to address every aspect of data handling, from collection to dispute resolution, with meticulous detail to eliminate ambiguity and provide clarity.

data_collection.title: Data Collection
content: We collect information to deliver personalized services, respond to inquiries, and enhance your experience on our portfolio website.
Contact Information: Includes full name, email address, phone number, company name, country, and any additional details provided via our multi-step contact form.
Technical Information: We collect device information, IP addresses, browser types, and usage patterns through cookies and analytics tools to optimize website performance.
User-Generated Content: Any information you voluntarily provide, such as comments on blog posts or project inquiries, may be collected and stored.

data_usage.title: Data Usage
content: The information we collect is used to provide and improve our services, respond to inquiries, and communicate project updates or opportunities.
Contact information is used to respond to your inquiries, provide quotes, or discuss potential collaborations.
Technical information helps us analyze website performance and user behavior to enhance functionality and user experience.
User-generated content may be used to showcase testimonials or project feedback with your explicit consent.

payment_data.title: Payment Data
content: For services requiring payment (e.g., website development or UI/UX design), we collect payment information through secure third-party processors like PayPal or Stripe.
We do not store sensitive payment details, such as credit card numbers, on our servers. All transactions are encrypted and handled by trusted payment gateways.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
content: Our website uses cookies to enhance user experience, track usage patterns, and provide personalized content.
Essential Cookies: Necessary for website functionality, such as session management and security.
Analytics Cookies: Used to collect anonymized data on user behavior to improve site performance.
You can manage cookie preferences via our cookie consent popup or browser settings.

data_sharing.title: Data Sharing
content: We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties for marketing purposes.
Data may be shared with trusted service providers (e.g., analytics tools, payment processors) to facilitate website operations, subject to strict confidentiality agreements.
In rare cases, we may disclose information to comply with legal obligations or protect our rights.

data_transfers.title: Data Transfers
content: As a global service provider, your data may be transferred to and processed in countries outside your jurisdiction, including regions with different data protection laws.
We ensure all data transfers comply with applicable regulations, such as GDPR, through standard contractual clauses or equivalent safeguards.

rights.title: Your Rights
content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information held by us.
You may also request restrictions on data processing or object to certain uses, such as analytics tracking.
To exercise these rights, contact us using the details provided in the Contact Us section.

security.title: Data Security
content: We implement robust security measures, including encryption, secure servers, and access controls, to protect your data from unauthorized access or breaches.
Despite our efforts, no online platform is entirely immune to risks. We strive to maintain the highest standards of data security.

third_party_links.title: Third-Party Links
content: Our website may contain links to third-party sites, such as LinkedIn or GitHub. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these external sites.
We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party sites you visit.

children_privacy.title: Children's Privacy
content: Our services are not intended for individuals under 16 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.
If you believe we have inadvertently collected data from a minor, please contact us immediately to have it removed.

dispute_resolution.title: Dispute Resolution
content: Any disputes related to this Privacy Policy will be resolved through negotiation or mediation in the first instance.
If unresolved, disputes will be governed by the laws of Cameroon, with jurisdiction in the courts of Buea.

liability.title: Liability
content: We are not liable for any damages arising from the use of our website or services, except as required by applicable law.
Our liability is limited to the extent permitted by law, and we strive to maintain transparency in all data-related practices.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements.
Significant changes will be communicated via email or a prominent notice on our website.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For questions, concerns, or requests related to this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
contact.address: Physical Address: MYG Tech, Buea, Southwest Region, Cameroon

introduction.title: Introduction
content: These Terms of Service govern your use of the MYG Tech portfolio website, including all features such as contact forms, blog interactions, project inquiries, and payment processing for services like website development and UI/UX design.

usage.title: Acceptable Use
content: To ensure a safe and professional environment, you agree to use the MYG Tech website in accordance with the following rules and all applicable laws.
You may not use the website to engage in illegal activities, distribute malicious content, or attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems.
Any misuse, including spamming contact forms or submitting false information, may result in suspension of access.

service_agreements.title: Service Agreements
content: All services, such as website development, mobile app development, or UI/UX design, are subject to formal agreements outlining scope, timelines, and payment terms.
Service agreements are finalized after mutual consent via email or signed contracts.
Payments for services are processed securely through third-party platforms like PayPal or Stripe.

content.title: Content
content: All content on the MYG Tech website, including text, images, and code snippets, is owned by MYG Tech unless otherwise stated.
You may not reproduce, distribute, or modify our content without explicit permission.

intellectual_property.title: Intellectual Property
content: Projects delivered to clients, such as websites or mobile apps, are transferred with agreed-upon intellectual property rights as specified in the service agreement.
MYG Tech retains the right to showcase completed projects in our portfolio unless otherwise agreed.

liability.title: Liability
content: MYG Tech is not liable for any damages arising from the use of our website or services, except as required by applicable law.
We strive to deliver high-quality services but cannot guarantee uninterrupted access to our website or error-free performance.

termination.title: Termination
content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend access to our website or services for violations of these Terms of Service.
Clients may terminate service agreements in accordance with the terms outlined in the contract.

dispute_resolution.title: Dispute Resolution
content: Any disputes arising from these Terms of Service will be resolved through negotiation or mediation in the first instance.
If unresolved, disputes will be governed by the laws of Cameroon, with jurisdiction in the courts of Buea.

governing.title: Governing Law
content: These Terms of Service are governed by the laws of Cameroon, without regard to conflict of law principles.

changes.title: Changes to These Terms
content: We may update these Terms of Service periodically to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements.
Significant changes will be communicated via email or a prominent notice on our website.

acceptance.message: I have read and agree to the MYG Tech Terms of Service:

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For questions or concerns about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:
contact.address: Physical Address: MYG Tech, Buea, Southwest Region, Cameroon
